subject: Soccer
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: With Villa out of the lineup with a strained abductor muscle, N.Y.C.F.C. was dealt its first M.L.S. defeat, a 1-0 loss to Sporting Kansas City.
snippet: With Villa out of the lineup with a strained abductor muscle, N.Y.C.F.C. was dealt its first M.L.S. defeat, a 1-0 loss to Sporting Kansas City.
